info.description: This is a simple Swagger Documentation NodeJS API pactap project to demonstrate
info.title: API DOCUMENT

post.description: This API is use for User signup in Application.
This API is use for User Login to Application.
This API is use for send OTP to user.
This API is use for verify OTP of user.
This API is use for Forgot Password to user.
This API is use for Reset Password to user.
This API is use for complete profile to user.
This API is use for Edit Address of user.
This API is use for getting details of user.
This API is use for vendor signup in Application.
This API is use for Vendor Login to Application.
This API is use for send OTP to vendor.
This API is use for verify OTP of vendor.
This API is use for Forgot Password to vendor.
This API is use for Reset Password to vendor.
This API is use for complete profile to user.
This API is use for getting details of vendor.
